title: It Takes Two
description: She never should have said yes to that first date, but she couldn’t resist his larger-than-life personality. Except now he seems determined to make their no-strings fling into something more. Breaking up should really be easier than this.He’s has always prided himself on being the good-time guy. Exactly her type…or so he thought. Yet ever since he suggested her moving in, she’s been pulling back. Well, he’s not about to let her get away that easily. He does everything with passion—especially falling in love. *this title was previously published as It Takes Two, Counting on Love book two*
author: Erin Nicholas
